numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some countries are lower on the graph.
2. The governments of the countries that are lower on the graph are stricter.
3. Very few people who are older than 40 years believe that the world is getting better.
4. Many people who are between 15 years and 24 years believe that the world is getting better.
5. Mali has the lowest faith in humanity.
6. Indonesia has the highest faith in humanity.
8. I wonder why Indonesia is so high on the graph.
9. I wonder what Indonesia does to satisfy people who are between 15 years and 24 years.
10. I wonder what Indonesia does to satisfy people who are older than 40 years.
11. People who are between 15 years and 24 years are a new generation.
12. This new generation will bring positive change to our community.
13. The title for the graph is "Back to the Future, Faith in Humanity".
